summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5665 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 1, Laurelhurst Addition, being the alley between 43rd Avenue Northeast and 45th Avenue Northeast, from East 44th Street to East 45th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 74957, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
